<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75011</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>5b7a56b9-f024-4df5-8f11-cdeda82f2a6b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Helyezd el a térképen az ércbányákat!</string>
            <string language="en">Place the ore-mines on the map!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plazieren Sie die Erz-Gruben auf die Karte!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Placez les minerai-mines sur la carte !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coloque as minério-minas no mapa!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disponga le minerale-miniere sul programma!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τοποθετήστε τα μετάλλευμα-ορυχεία στο χάρτη!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Coloque las mineral-minas en la correspondencia!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tatárjárás (1241-1242)</string>
            <string language="en">The Tartar-ravage (1241-1242)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">történelem, Helyezd el a térképen az ércbányákat!, interaktív feladat, térkép, ércbánya</string>
            <string language="en">history, Place the ore-mines on the map!, interactive task, map, ore-mine</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Weinstein-ravage (1241-1242)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Tartar-ravage (1241-1242)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Tartar-ravage-ravage (1241-1242)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Tartar-devastare (1241-1242)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τάρταρος-καταστροφή (1241-1242)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ta'rtaro-ravage (1241-1242)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte, plazieren die Erz-Gruben auf die Karte!, 
interaktive Aufgabe, Karte, Erz-Grube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'histoire, placent les minerai-mines sur la carte !, 
interactif chargez, tracez, minerai-mine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o history, coloca as minério-minas no mapa!, 
tarefa interativa, mapa, minério-mina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la storia, dispone le minerale-miniere sul programma!, 
operazione interattiva, programma, minerale-miniera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ιστορία, τοποθετεί τα μετάλλευμα-ορυχεία στο χάρτη!, 
διαλογική στοιχειώδης εργασία, χάρτης, μετάλλευμα-ορυχείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la historia, coloca las mineral-minas en la 
correspondencia!, tarea interactiva, correspondencia, 
mineral-mina</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

    <name>
